Title: Relates to excepting certain persons or entities from indemnity bonds or insurance policy requirements when renting or leasing rental vehicles to film or television production companies
Summary: Relates to excepting certain persons or entities from indemnity bonds or insurance policy requirements when renting or leasing rental vehicles to film or television production companies; provides that rental car companies are not subject to certain corporate surety bond or liability insurance coverage requirements when renting to a film or television production company when such production company purchases insurance that complies with surety bond or insurance requirements.
LawCode: Amd ยง370, V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to excepting certain persons or entities from indemnity bonds or insurance policy requirements when renting or leasing rental vehicles to film or television production companies
